meanings.definition: The strength of an electric current measured in amperes.
meanings.sent1: The amperage of the wires was too high for the small device.
meanings.sent2: The technician checked the amperage to ensure the circuit was safe.
meanings.sent3: The party clown joked that the amperage of the music was electrifying!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like a high amperage current, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The amperage surged through the cables, powering the entire system.

meanings.definition: The amount of electric current flowing in a circuit.
meanings.sent1: He adjusted the amperage to prevent overload in the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The amperage reading showed a steady flow of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The amperage in the wires decided to take a vacation, causing a blackout.
meanings.sent4: The amperage in her words was so strong, it sparked inspiration in others.
meanings.sent5: The amperage in the circuit was like a river, flowing smoothly to power the devices.
